access_key.description: The Access Key of BaiduCloud for API operations. You can retrieve this from the 'Security Management' section of the BaiduCloud console.

region.description: The region where BaiduCloud operations will take place. Examples are bj, su, gz, etc.

secret_key.description: The Secret key of BaiduCloud for API operations. You can retrieve this from the 'Security Management' section of the BaiduCloud console.

account_id.description: The main account id for assume role account.

acl.description: The acl for this assume role.

role_name.description: The role name for assume role.

user_id.description: The user id for assume role.

appblb.description: Use this to override the default endpoint URL constructed from the `region`. It's typically used to connect to custom BLB endpoints.

bcc.description: Use this to override the default endpoint URL constructed from the `region`. It's typically used to connect to custom BCC endpoints.

bos.description: Use this to override the default endpoint URL constructed from the `region`. It's typically used to connect to custom BOS endpoints.

cce.description: Use this to override the default endpoint URL constructed from the `region`. It's typically used to connect to custom CCE endpoints.

ccev2.description: Use this to override the default endpoint URL constructed from the `region`. It's typically used to connect to custom CCEv2 endpoints.

cfc.description: Use this to override the default endpoint URL constructed from the `region`. It's typically used to connect to custom CFC endpoints.

dts.description: Use this to override the default endpoint URL constructed from the `region`. It's typically used to connect to custom DTS endpoints.

eip.description: Use this to override the default endpoint URL constructed from the `region`. It's typically used to connect to custom EIP endpoints.

rds.description: Use this to override the default endpoint URL constructed from the `region`. It's typically used to connect to custom RDS endpoints.

scs.description: Use this to override the default endpoint URL constructed from the `region`. It's typically used to connect to custom SCS endpoints.

vpc.description: Use this to override the default endpoint URL constructed from the `region`. It's typically used to connect to custom VPC endpoints.

action.description: Action of the acl. Valid values are allow and deny.

destination_ip_address.description: Destination ip address of the acl.

direction.description: Direction of the acl. Valid values are ingress and egress, respectively indicating the inbound of the rule and the outbound rule.

position.description: Position of the acl, representing the priority of the acl rule. The value should be 1-5000 and cannot be duplicated with existing entries. The smaller the value, the higher the priority, and the rule matching order is to match the priority from high to low.

protocol.description: Protocol of the acl, available values are all, tcp, udp and icmp.

source_ip_address.description: Source ip address of the acl.

address.description: LoadBalance instance's service IP, instance can be accessed through this IP

cidr.description: Cidr of the network where the LoadBalance instance reside

description.description: LoadBalance's description, length must be between 0 and 450 bytes, and support Chinese

listener.description: List of listeners mounted under the instance

name.description: LoadBalance instance's name, length must be between 1 and 65 bytes, and will be automatically generated if not set

status.description: LoadBalance instance's status, see https://cloud.baidu.com/doc/BLB/s/Pjwvxnxdm/#blbstatus for detail

subnet_cidr.description: Cidr of the subnet which the LoadBalance instance belongs

subnet_id.description: The subnet ID to which the LoadBalance instance belongs

subnet_name.description: The subnet name to which the LoadBalance instance belongs

vpc_id.description: The VPC short ID to which the LoadBalance instance belongs

vpc_name.description: The VPC name to which the LoadBalance instance belongs

blb_id.description: ID of the Application LoadBalance instance

client_cert_ids.description: Listener import cert list, only useful when dual_auth is true

dual_auth.description: Listener open dual authorization or not, default false

encryption_protocols.description: Listener encryption protocol, only useful when encryption_type is userDefind, support [sslv3, tlsv10, tlsv11, tlsv12]

encryption_type.description: Listener encryption option, support [compatibleIE, incompatibleIE, userDefind]

ie6_compatible.description: Listener support ie6 option, default true

keep_session_cookie_name.description: CookieName which need to covered, useful when keep_session_type is rewrite

keep_session_timeout.description: KeepSession Cookie timeout time(second), support in [1, 15552000], default 3600s

keep_session_type.description: KeepSessionType option, support insert/rewrite, default insert

redirect_port.description: Redirect HTTP request to HTTPS Listener, HTTPS Listener port set by this parameter

scheduler.description: Load balancing algorithm, support RoundRobin/LeastConnection/Hash, if protocol is HTTP/HTTPS, only support RoundRobin/LeastConnection

server_timeout.description: Backend server maximum timeout time, only support in [1, 3600] second, default 30s

tcp_session_timeout.description: TCP Listener connection session timeout time(second), default 900, support 10-4000

x_forwarded_for.description: Listener xForwardedFor, determine get client real ip or not, default false

blb_id.description: ID of the Application LoadBalance instance

description.description: Server Group's description, length must be between 0 and 450 bytes, and support Chinese

name.description: Name of the Server Group, length must be between 1 and 65 bytes, and will be automatically generated if not set

status.description: Server Group's status, see https://cloud.baidu.com/doc/BLB/s/Pjwvxnxdm/#blbstatus for detail

private_ip.description: Backend server instance bind private ip

weight.description: Backend server instance weight in this group, range from 0-100

health_check.description: Server Group port health check protocol, support TCP/UDP/HTTP, default same as port protocol type

health_check_down_retry.description: Server Group health check down retry time, support in [2, 5], default 3

health_check_interval_in_second.description: Server Group health check interval time(second), support in [1, 10], default 3

health_check_normal_status.description: Server Group health check normal http status code, only useful when health_check is HTTP

health_check_port.description: Server Group port health check port, default same as Server Group port

health_check_timeout_in_second.description: Server Group health check timeout(second), support in [1, 60], default 3

health_check_up_retry.description: Server Group health check up retry time, support in [2, 5], default 3

health_check_url_path.description: Server Group health check url path, only useful when health_check is HTTP

port.description: App Server Group port, range from 1-65535

type.description: Server Group port protocol type, support TCP/UDP/HTTP

udp_health_check_string.description: Server Group udp health check string, if type is UDP, this parameter is required

created_time.description: Creation time of the automatic snapshot policy.

deleted_time.description: Deletion time of the automatic snapshot policy.

last_execute_time.description: Last execution time of the automatic snapshot policy.

name.description: Name of the automatic snapshot policy, which supports uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers, Chinese and special characters, such as "-","_","/",",".", and the value must start with a letter, length 1-65.

repeat_weekdays.description: Repeat time of the automatic snapshot policy, supporting in range of [0, 6]

retention_days.description: Number of days to retain the automatic snapshot, and -1 means permanently retained.

status.description: Status of the automatic snapshot policy.

time_points.description: Time point of generate snapshot in a day, the minimum unit is hour, supporting in range of [0, 23]

updated_time.description: Update time of the automatic snapshot policy.

volume_count.description: The count of volumes associated with the snapshot.

volume_ids.description: Volume id list to be attached of the automatic snapshot policy, these CDS volumes must be in-used.

acl.description: Canned ACL to apply, available values are private, public-read and public-read-write. Default to private.

creation_date.description: Creation date of the BOS bucket.

force_destroy.description: Whether to force delete the bucket and related objects when the bucket is not empty. Default to false.

owner_id.description: Owner ID of the BOS bucket.

owner_name.description: Owner name of the BOS bucket.

server_side_encryption_rule.description: Encryption rule for the server side, which can only be AES256 currently.

storage_class.description: Storage class of the BOS bucket, available values are STANDARD, STANDARD_IA, COLD or ARCHIVE.

resource.description: The resources to be protected for copyright.

allowed_expose_headers.description: Specifies which expose headers are allowed.

allowed_methods.description: Specifies which methods are allowed. Can be GET,PUT,DELETE,POST or HEAD.

allowed_origins.description: Specifies which origins are allowed, containing up to one * wildcard.

max_age_seconds.description: Specifies time in seconds that browser can cache the response for a preflight request.

id.description: ID of the lifecycle rule. The id must be unique and cannot be repeated in the same bucket. The system will automatically generate one when it is not specified.

resource.description: Resource of the lifecycle rule. For example, samplebucket/prefix/* will be valid for the object prefixed with prefix/ in samplebucket; samplebucket/* will be valid for all objects in samplebucket.

status.description: Status of the lifecycle rule, which can be enabled, disabled. The rule cannot take effect when the status is disabled.

name.description: Action name of the lifecycle rule, which can be Transition, DeleteObject and AbortMultipartUpload.

storage_class.description: When the action is Transition, it can be set to STANDARD_IA or COLD or ARCHIVE, indicating that it is changed from the original storage type to low frequency storage or cold storage or archive storage.

date_greater_than.description: Support absolute time date and relative time days. The absolute time date format is yyyy-mm-ddThh:mm:ssZ,eg. 2019-09-07T00:00:00Z. The absolute time is UTC time, which must end at 00:00:00(UTC 0 point); the description of relative time days follows ISO8601, and the minimum time granularity supported is days, such as: $(lastModified)+P7D indicates the time of object 7 days after last-modified.

target_bucket.description: Target bucket name that will receive the log data.

target_prefix.description: Target prefix for the log data.

replicate_deletes.description: Whether to enable the delete synchronization, which can be enabled, disabled.

resource.description: Resource of the replication configuration. The configuration format of the resource is {$bucket_name/<effective object prefix>}, which must start with "$bucket_name"+"/"

status.description: Status of the replication configuration. Valid values are enabled and disabled.

bucket.description: Destination bucket name of the replication configuration.

storage_class.description: Destination storage class of the replication configuration, the parameter does not need to be configured if it is consistent with the storage class of the source bucket, if you need to specify the storage class separately, it can be COLD, STANDARD, STANDARD_IA.

bucket.description: Destination bucket name of the replication configuration.

storage_class.description: Destination storage class of the replication configuration, the parameter does not need to be configured if it is consistent with the storage class of the source bucket, if you need to specify the storage class separately, it can be COLD, STANDARD, STANDARD_IA.

error_document.description: An absolute path to the document to return in case of a 404 error.

index_document.description: Baiducloud BOS returns this index document when requests are made to the root domain or any of the subfolders.

acl.description: Canned ACL of the object, which can be private or public-read. If the value is not set, the object permission will be empty by default, and then the bucket permission as default.

bucket.description: Name of the bucket to put the file in.

cache_control.description: The caching behavior along the request/reply chain. Valid values are private, no-cache, max-age and must-revalidate. If not set, the value is empty.

content.description: The literal string value that will be uploaded as the object content.

content_crc32.description: Crc(cyclic redundancy check code) value of the object.

content_disposition.description: Specifies presentational information for the object, which can be inline or attachment. If not set, the value is empty.

content_length.description: Length of the content to be uploaded.

content_md5.description: MD5 digest of the HTTP request content defined in RFC2616 can be carried by the field to verify whether the file saved on the BOS side is consistent with the file expected by the user.

content_sha256.description: Sha256 value of the object, which is used to verify whether the file saved on the BOS side is consistent with the file expected by the user, the sha256 has higher verification accuracy, and the sha256 value of the transmitted data must match this, otherwise the object uploaded fails.

content_type.description: Type to describe the format of the object data.

expires.description: The expire date is used to set the cache expiration time when downloading object. If it is not set, the BOS will set the cache expiration time to three days by default.

key.description: Name of the object once it is in the bucket.

last_modified.description: Last modified date of the object.

source.description: The file path that will be read and uploaded as raw bytes for the object content.

storage_class.description: Storage class of the object, which can be COLD, STANDARD_IA, STANDARD or ARCHIVE. Default to STANDARD.

user_meta.description: The mapping of key/values to to provision metadata, which will be automatically prefixed by x-bce-meta-.

advanced_options.description: Advanced options configuration of the cce cluster.

cluster_name.description: Name of the Cluster. Support for uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers, Chinese and special characters, such as "-","_","/",".", the value must start with a letter, length 1-65.

cluster_node_num.description: Number of nodes in the cluster.

comment.description: Comment information of the cce cluster.

container_net.description: Container network type of the cce cluster.

create_start_time.description: Create time of the cce cluster.

delete_eip_cds.description: Whether to delete the eip and cds, default to true.

delete_snapshots.description: Whether to delete the snapshots, default to true.

delete_time.description: Delete time of the cce cluster.

deploy_mode.description: Deployment mode of the cce cluster, which can only be BCC.

instance_mode.description: Instance mode of the cce cluster.

main_available_zone.description: Main available zone of the cce cluster, support zoneA, zoneB, etc.

master_vm_count.description: Number of virtual machines in the master node of the cce cluster.

version.description: Kubernetes version of the cce cluster.

vpc_cidr.description: VPC cidr of the cce cluster.

vpc_id.description: VPC id of the cce cluster.

vpc_uuid.description: VPC uuid of the cce cluster.

auto_renew.description: Whether the master is automatically renewed.

auto_renew_time.description: The time length of automatic renewal. It is valid only when the product_type is prepay and auto_renew is true.

auto_renew_time_unit.description: Time unit of automatic renewal, the default value is month, It is valid only when the product_type is prepay and auto_renew is true.

gpu_card.description: Gpu card of the master node.

image_id.description: Image id of the master node.

image_type.description: Image type of the master node.

instance_type.description: Instance type of the master node.

logical_zone.description: Logical zone of the master node.

memory.description: Memory capacity(GB) of the master node.

product_type.description: Product type of the master node, which can be postpay or prepay.

purchase_length.description: Purchase duration of the master node.

root_disk_size_in_gb.description: System disk size(GB) of the master node.

root_disk_storage_type.description: System disk storage type of the master node.

subnet_uuid.description: Subnet uuid of the master node.

auto_renew.description: Whether the worker is automatically renewed.

auto_renew_time.description: The time length of automatic renewal. It is valid only when the product_type is prepay and auto_renew is true.

auto_renew_time_unit.description: Time unit of automatic renewal, the default value is month, It is valid only when the product_type is prepay and auto_renew is true.

cpu.description: Number of cpu cores for the worker node.

gpu_card.description: Gpu card of the worker node.

gpu_count.description: Gpu count of the worker node.

image_id.description: Image id of the worker node.

image_type.description: Image type of the worker node, which can be common, custom, gpuBccImage, gpuBccCustom, sharing.

instance_type.description: Instance type of the worker node.

memory.description: Memory size of the worker node.

product_type.description: Product type of the worker node, which can be postpay or prepay.

purchase_length.description: Purchase duration of the worker node.

root_disk_size_in_gb.description: System disk size(GB) of the worker node.

root_disk_storage_type.description: System disk storage type of the worker node.

subnet_uuid.description: Subnet uuid of the worker node.

disk_size_in_gb.description: Volume of disk in GB. Default is 0.

volume_type.description: Types of diskï¼Œavailable values: CLOUD_PREMIUM and CLOUD_SSD.

ip_version.description: IP Version. Available Value: [ipv4, ipv6, dualStack].

max_pods_per_node.description: Max pod number in one node

mode.description: Network Mode. Available Value: [kubenet, vpc-cni, vpc-route-veth, vpc-route-ipvlan, vpc-route-auto-detect, vpc-secondary-ip-veth, vpc-secondary-ip-ipvlan, vpc-secondary-ip-auto-detect].

node_port_range_max.description: Node Port Service Port Range Max

node_port_range_min.description: Node Port Service Port Range Min

cluster_ha.description: Number of master nodes. Available Value: [1, 3, 5, 2(for serverless)].

master_type.description: Master Type. Available Value: [managed, custom, serverless].

master_vpc_subnet_zone.description: Master VPC Subnet Zone. Available Value: [zoneA, zoneB, zoneC, zoneD, zoneE, zoneF].

cluster_role.description: Cluster Role of Instance, Master or Nodes. Available Value: [master, node].

instance_charging_type.description: Instance charging type. Available Value: [Prepaid, Postpaid, bidding].

instance_group_id.description: Instance Group ID of this Instance

instance_type.description: Instance Type Available Value: [N1, N2, N3, N4, N5, C1, C2, S1, G1, F1].

machine_type.description: Machine Type. Available Value: [BCC, BBC, Metal].

master_type.description: Master Type. Available Value: [managed, custom, serverless].

need_eip.description: Whether the instance need a EIP

eip_charging_type.description: EIP Charging Type. Available Value: [ByTraffic, ByBandwidth].

image_type.description: Image type. Available Value: [Integration, System, All, Custom, Sharing, GpuBccSystem, GpuBccCustom, BbcSystem, BbcCustom].

os_name.description: OS name. Available Value: [CentOS, Ubuntu, Windows Server, Debian, opensuse].

auto_renew_time.description: Number of time unit for auto renew

gpu_type.description: GPU Type. Available Value: [V100-32, V100-16, P40, P4, K40, DLCard].

root_disk_type.description: Root disk type. Available Value: [std1, hp1, cloud_hp1, local, sata, ssd, hdd].

storage_type.description: Storage Type. Available Value: [std1, hp1, cloud_hp1, local, sata, ssd, hdd].

effect.description: Taint Effect. Available Value: [NoSchedule, PreferNoSchedule, NoExecute].

available_zone.description: Available Zone. Available Value: [zoneA, zoneB, zoneC, zoneD, zoneE, zoneF].

vpc_subnet_type.description: VPC Subnet type. Available Value: [BCC, BCC_NAT, BBC].

nodes.description: All detail info of nodes in this instance group

replicas.description: Number of instances in this Instance Group

cluster_role.description: Cluster Role of Instance, Master or Nodes. Available Value: [master, node].

instance_charging_type.description: Instance charging type. Available Value: [Prepaid, Postpaid, bidding].

instance_group_id.description: Instance Group ID of this Instance

instance_type.description: Instance Type Available Value: [N1, N2, N3, N4, N5, C1, C2, S1, G1, F1].

machine_type.description: Machine Type. Available Value: [BCC, BBC, Metal].

master_type.description: Master Type. Available Value: [managed, custom, serverless].

need_eip.description: Whether the instance need a EIP

eip_charging_type.description: EIP Charging Type. Available Value: [ByTraffic, ByBandwidth].

image_type.description: Image type. Available Value: [Integration, System, All, Custom, Sharing, GpuBccSystem, GpuBccCustom, BbcSystem, BbcCustom].

os_name.description: OS name. Available Value: [CentOS, Ubuntu, Windows Server, Debian, opensuse].

auto_renew_time.description: Number of time unit for auto renew

gpu_type.description: GPU Type. Available Value: [V100-32, V100-16, P40, P4, K40, DLCard].

root_disk_type.description: Root disk type. Available Value: [std1, hp1, cloud_hp1, local, sata, ssd, hdd].

storage_type.description: Storage Type. Available Value: [std1, hp1, cloud_hp1, local, sata, ssd, hdd].

effect.description: Taint Effect. Available Value: [NoSchedule, PreferNoSchedule, NoExecute].

available_zone.description: Available Zone. Available Value: [zoneA, zoneB, zoneC, zoneD, zoneE, zoneF].

vpc_subnet_type.description: VPC Subnet type. Available Value: [BCC, BCC_NAT, BBC].

auto_snapshot.description: Delete relate auto snapshot when release this cds volume

auto_snapshot_policy_id.description: CDS bind Auto Snapshot policy id

disk_size_in_gb.description: CDS disk size, support between 5 and 32765, if snapshot_id not set, this parameter is required.

manual_snapshot.description: Delete relate snapshot when release this cds volume

payment_timing.description: payment method, support Prepaid or Postpaid

reservation_length.description: Prepaid reservation length, support [1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9, 12, 24, 36], only useful when payment_timing is Prepaid

reservation_time_unit.description: Prepaid reservation time unit, only support Month now

snapshot_id.description: Snapshot id, support create cds use snapshot, when set this parameter, cds_disk_size is ignored

storage_type.description: CDS dist storage type, support hp1, std1, cloud_hp1 and hdd, default hp1, see https://cloud.baidu.com/doc/BCC/s/6jwvyo0q2/#storagetype for detail

instance_id.description: The ID of Instance which will attach CDS volume

cert_private_data.description: Cert private key data, base64 encode

function_version.description: CFC Function version this alias binded

code_bos_bucket.description: CFC Function Code storage bos bucket name

code_bos_object.description: CFC Function Code storage bos object key

code_file_dir.description: CFC Function Code local file dir

code_file_name.description: CFC Function Code local zip file name

function_name.description: CFC function name, length must be between 1 and 64 bytes

log_bos_dir.description: Log save dir if log type is bos

memory_size.description: CFC Function memory size, should be an integer multiple of 128

security_group_ids.description: CFC Function binded Security group list

subnet_ids.description: CFC Function bined VPC Subnet id list

auth_type.description: CFC Function Trigger auth type if source_type is http, support anonymous or iam

bos_event_type.description: CFC Function Trigger bos event type

bucket.description: CFC Function Trigger source bucket if source_type is bos

cdn_event_type.description: CFC Function Trigger cdn event type

domain.description: CFC Function Trigger domain if source_type is cdn

enabled.description: CFC Function Trigger enabled if source_type is crontab

input.description: CFC Function Trigger input if source_type is crontab

method.description: CFC Function Trigger method if source_type is http

name.description: CFC Function Trigger name if source_type is bos or crontab

remark.description: CFC Function Trigger remark if source_type is cdn

resource.description: CFC Function Trigger resource if source_type is bos

resource_path.description: CFC Function Trigger resource path if source_type is http

schedule_expression.description: CFC Function Trigger schedule expression if source_type is crontab

source_type.description: CFC Funtion Trigger source type, support bos/http/crontab/dueros/duedge/cdn

status.description: CFC Funtion Trigger status if source_type is bos or cdn

target.description: CFC Function Trigger target, it should be function brn

function_name.description: CFC function name, length must be between 1 and 64 bytes

log_bos_dir.description: Log save dir if log type is bos

region.description: CFC Function bined VPC Subnet id list

cross_region_tag.description: cross region tag of the task. Available value are 0, 1.

operation.description: operation of the task. Available values are precheck, getprecheck, start, pause, shutdown.

product_type.description: product type of the task. Available value is postpay.

source_instance_type.description: source instance type of the task. Available values are public, bcerds.

standard.description: standard of the task. Available value is Large.

target_instance_type.description: target instance type of the task. Available values are public, bcerds.

type.description: type of the task. Available values are migration, sync, subscribe.

auto_renew_time.description: Eip auto renew time length, only useful when payment_timing is Prepaid. If auto_renew_time_unit is month, support 1-9, if auto_renew_time_unit is year, support 1-3.

auto_renew_time_unit.description: Eip auto renew time unit, only useful when payment_timing is Prepaid, support month/year

bandwidth_in_mbps.description: Eip bandwidth(Mbps), if payment_timing is Prepaid or billing_method is ByBandWidth, support between 1 and 200, if billing_method is ByTraffic, support between 1 and 1000

billing_method.description: Eip billing method, support ByTraffic or ByBandwidth

name.description: Eip name, length must be between 1 and 65 bytes

payment_timing.description: Eip payment timing, support Prepaid and Postpaid

reservation_length.description: Eip Prepaid billing reservation length, only useful when payment_timing is Prepaid

reservation_time_unit.description: Eip Prepaid billing reservation time unit, only useful when payment_timing is Prepaid

eip.description: EIP which need to associate with instance

instance_id.description: Instance ID which need to associate with EIP

instance_type.description: Instance type which need to associate with EIP, support BCC/BLB/NAT/VPN

force_destroy.description: Delete group and its related user memberships and policy attachments.

users.description: Names of users to add into group.

policy_type.description: Type of policy, valid values are Custom/System.

force_destroy.description: Delete user and its related access keys, group memberships and policy attachments.

policy_type.description: Type of policy, valid values are Custom/System.

action.description: Start or stop the instance, which can only be start or stop, default start.

admin_pass.description: Password of the instance to be started. This value should be 8-16 characters, and English, numbers and symbols must exist at the same time. The symbols is limited to "!@#$%^*()".

auto_renew_time_length.description: The time length of automatic renewal. It is valid when payment_timing is Prepaid, and the value should be 1-9 when the auto_renew_time_unit is month and 1-3 when the auto_renew_time_unit is year. Default to 1.

auto_renew_time_unit.description: Time unit of automatic renewal, the value can be month or year. The default value is empty, indicating no automatic renewal. It is valid only when the payment_timing is Prepaid.

availability_zone.description: Availability zone to start the instance in.

card_count.description: Count of the GPU cards or FPGA cards to be carried for the instance to be created, it is valid only when the gpu_card or fpga_card field is not empty.

cds_auto_renew.description: Whether the cds is automatically renewed. It is valid when payment_timing is Prepaid. Default to false.

cpu_count.description: Number of CPU cores to be created for the instance.

delete_cds_snapshot_flag.description: Whether to release the cds disk snapshots, default to false. It is effective only when the related_release_flag is true.

image_id.description: ID of the image to be used for the instance.

instance_type.description: Type of the instance to start. Available values are N1, N2, N3, N4, N5, C1, C2, S1, G1, F1. Default to N3.

internal_ip.description: Internal IP assigned to the instance.

keypair_id.description: Key pair id of the instance.

keypair_name.description: Key pair name of the instance.

memory_capacity_in_gb.description: Memory capacity(GB) of the instance to be created.

name.description: Name of the instance. Support for uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers, Chinese and special characters, such as "-","_","/",".", the value must start with a letter, length 1-65.

network_capacity_in_mbps.description: Public network bandwidth(Mbps) of the instance.

placement_policy.description: The placement policy of the instance, which can be default or dedicatedHost.

related_release_flag.description: Whether to release the eip and data disks mounted by the current instance. Can only be released uniformly or not. Default to false.

relation_tag.description: The new instance associated with existing Tags or not, default false. The Tags should already exit if set true

root_disk_size_in_gb.description: System disk size(GB) of the instance to be created. The value range is [40,500]GB, Default to 40GB, and more than 40GB is charged according to the cloud disk price. Note that the specified system disk size needs to meet the minimum disk space limit of the mirror used.

root_disk_storage_type.description: System disk storage type of the instance. Available values are std1, hp1, cloud_hp1, local, sata, ssd. Default to cloud_hp1.

subnet_id.description: The subnet ID of VPC. The default subnet will be used when it is empty. The instance will restart after changing the subnet.

storage_type.description: Storage type of the ephemeral disk. Available values are std1, hp1, cloud_hp1, local, sata, ssd. Default to cloud_hp1.

billing.description: Billing information of the NAT gateway.

eips.description: One public network EIP associated with the NAT gateway or one or more EIPs in the shared bandwidth.

expired_time.description: Expired time of the NAT gateway, which will be empty when the payment_timing is Postpaid.

name.description: Name of the NAT gateway, consisting of uppercase and lowercase lettersã€numbers and special characters, such as "-","_","/",".". The value must start with a letter, and the length should between 1-65.

spec.description: Specification of the NAT gateway, available values are small(supports up to 5 public IPs), medium(up to 10 public IPs) and large(up to 15 public IPs). Default to small.

vpc_id.description: VPC ID of the NAT gateway.

billing.description: Billing information of the peer connection.

created_time.description: Created time of the peer connection.

dns_status.description: DNS status of the peer connection.

dns_sync.description: Whether to open the switch of dns synchronization.

expired_time.description: Expired time of the peer connection, which will be empty when the payment_timing is Postpaid.

local_if_id.description: Local interface ID of the peer connection.

local_if_name.description: Local interface name of the peer connection.

local_vpc_id.description: Local VPC ID of the peer connection.

peer_account_id.description: Peer account ID of the peer VPC, which is required only when creating a peer connection across accounts.

peer_if_name.description: Peer interface name of the peer connection, which is allowed to be set only when the peer connection within this account.

peer_region.description: Peer region of the peer connection.

peer_vpc_id.description: Peer VPC ID of the peer connection.

role.description: Role of the peer connection, which can be initiator or acceptor.

auto_accept.description: Whether to accept the peer connection request, default to false.

auto_reject.description: Whether to reject the peer connection request, default to false.

billing.description: Billing information of the peer connection.

created_time.description: Created time of the peer connection.

dns_status.description: DNS status of the peer connection.

dns_sync.description: Whether to open the switch of dns synchronization.

expired_time.description: Expired time of the peer connection, which will be empty when the payment_timing is Postpaid.

local_if_id.description: Local interface ID of the peer connection.

local_if_name.description: Local interface name of the peer connection.

local_vpc_id.description: Local VPC ID of the peer connection.

peer_account_id.description: Peer account ID of the peer VPC, which is required only when creating a peer connection across accounts.

peer_if_name.description: Peer interface name of the peer connection, which is allowed to be set only when the peer connection within this account.

peer_region.description: Peer region of the peer connection.

peer_vpc_id.description: Peer VPC ID of the peer connection.

role.description: Role of the peer connection, which can be initiator or acceptor.

account_type.description: Type of the Account, Available values are Commonã€Super. The default is Common

address.description: The domain used to access a instance.

category.description: Category of the instance. Available values are Basicã€Standard(Default), only SQLServer 2012sp3 support Basic.

engine.description: Engine of the instance. Available values are MySQLã€SQLServerã€PostgreSQL.

engine_version.description: Engine version of the instance. MySQL support 5.5ã€5.6ã€5.7, SQLServer support 2008r2ã€2012sp3ã€2016sp1, PostgreSQL support 9.4

instance_name.description: Name of the instance. Support for uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers, Chinese and special characters, such as "-","_","/",".", the value must start with a letter, length 1-65.

instance_type.description: Type of the instance,  Available values are Master, ReadReplica, RdsProxy.

port.description: The port used to access a instance.

purchase_count.description: Count of the instance to buy

used_storage.description: Memory capacity(GB) of the instance to be used.

v_net_ip.description: The internal ip used to access a instance.

address.description: The domain used to access a instance.

category.description: Category of the instance. Available values are Basicã€Standard(Default), only SQLServer 2012sp3 support Basic.

instance_name.description: Name of the instance. Support for uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers, Chinese and special characters, such as "-","_","/",".", the value must start with a letter, length 1-65.

instance_type.description: Type of the instance,  Available values are Master, ReadReplica, RdsProxy.

port.description: The port used to access a instance.

used_storage.description: Memory capacity(GB) of the instance to be used.

v_net_ip.description: The internal ip used to access a instance.

destination_address.description: Destination CIDR block of the routing rule. The network segment can be 0.0.0.0/0, otherwise, the destination address cannot overlap with this VPC CIDR block(except when the destination network segment or the VPC CIDR is 0.0.0.0/0).

next_hop_type.description: Type of the next hop, available values are customã€vpn and nat.

source_address.description: Source CIDR block of the routing rule. The value can be all network segments 0.0.0.0/0, existing subnet segments in the VPC, or the network segment within the subnet.

auto_renew_time_length.description: The time length of automatic renewal. It is valid when payment_timing is Prepaid, and the value should be 1-9 when the auto_renew_time_unit is month and 1-3 when the auto_renew_time_unit is year. Default to 1.

auto_renew_time_unit.description: Time unit of automatic renewal, the value can be month or year. The default value is empty, indicating no automatic renewal. It is valid only when the payment_timing is Prepaid.

cluster_type.description: Type of the instance,  Available values are cluster, master_slave.

engine.description: Engine of the instance. Available values are redis, memcache.

engine_version.description: Engine version of the instance. Available values are 3.2, 4.0.

instance_name.description: Name of the instance. Support for uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers, Chinese and special characters, such as "-","_","/",".", the value must start with a letter, length 1-65.

node_type.description: Type of the instance. Available values are cache.n1.micro, cache.n1.small, cache.n1.medium...cache.n1hs3.4xlarge.

port.description: The port used to access a instance.

purchase_count.description: Count of the instance to buy

shard_num.description: The number of instance shard. IF cluster_type is cluster, support 2/4/6/8/12/16/24/32/48/64/96/128, if cluster_type is master_slave, support 1.

used_capacity.description: Memory capacity(GB) of the instance to be used.

v_net_ip.description: The internal ip used to access a instance.

dest_group_id.description: SecurityGroup rule's destination group id, dest_group_id and dest_ip can not set in the same time

dest_ip.description: SecurityGroup rule's destination ip, dest_group_id and dest_ip can not set in the same time

ether_type.description: SecurityGroup rule's ether type, support IPv4/IPv6

port_range.description: SecurityGroup rule's port range, you can set single port like 80, or set a port range, like 1-65535, default 1-65535. If protocol is all, only support 1-65535

protocol.description: SecurityGroup rule's protocol, support tcp/udp/icmp/all, default all

source_group_id.description: SecurityGroup rule's source group id, source_group_id and source_ip can not set in the same time

source_ip.description: SecurityGroup rule's source ip, source_group_id and source_ip can not set in the same time

name.description: Name of the snapshot, which supports uppercase and lowercase letters, numbers, Chinese and special characters, such as "-","_","/",",".", and the value must start with a letter, length 1-65.

size_in_gb.description: Size of the snapshot in GB.

volume_id.description: Volume id of the snapshot, this value will be nil if volume has been released.

description.description: Description of the subnet, and the value must be no more than 200 characters.

name.description: Name of the subnet, which cannot take the value "default", the length is no more than 65 characters, and the value can be composed of numbers, characters and underscores.

subnet_type.description: Type of the subnet, valid values are BCC, BCC_NAT and BBC. Default to BCC.

zone_name.description: The availability zone name within which the subnet should be created.

description.description: Description of the VPC. The value is no more than 200 characters.

name.description: Name of the VPC, which cannot take the value "default", the length is no more than 65 characters, and the value can be composed of numbers, characters and underscores.

route_table_id.description: Route table ID created by default on VPC creation.

secondary_cidrs.description: Secondary cidr list of the VPC. They will not be repeated.

acl_id.description: ID of the ACL to retrieve.

subnet_id.description: Subnet ID of the ACLs to retrieve.

vpc_id.description: VPC ID of the ACLs to retrieve.

blb_id.description: ID of the Application LoadBalance instance

listener_port.description: The port of the Listener to be queried

listeners.description: A list of Application LoadBalance Listener

protocol.description: Protocol of the Listener to be queried

blb_id.description: ID of the LoadBalance instance to be queried

exactly_match.description: Whether the name is an exact match or not, default false

name.description: Name of the Server Group to be queried

server_groups.description: A list of Application LoadBalance Server Group

address.description: Address ip of the LoadBalance instance to be queried

appblbs.description: A list of Application LoadBalance Instance

bcc_id.description: ID of the BCC instance bound to the LoadBalance

blb_id.description: ID of the LoadBalance instance to be queried

exactly_match.description: Whether the query condition is an exact match or not, default false

name.description: Name of the LoadBalance instance to be queried

asp_name.description: Name of the automatic snapshot policy.

auto_snapshot_policies.description: The automatic snapshot policies search result list.

output_file.description: Automatic snapshot policies search result output file.

bucket.description: Bucket name of the objects to retrieve.
Name of the bucket to retrieve.

available_zone.description: Available zone of the cluster node.

instance_name_regex.description: Regex pattern of the search spec name.

nodes.description: Result of the cluster nodes list.

config_type.description: Config type of the cce cluster.

version_regex.description: Regex pattern of the search version

order.description: Ascendant or descendant order. Available Value: [ASC, DESC].

order_by.description: The field that used to order the list. Available Value: [instanceName, instanceID, createdAt].

total_count.description: The total count of the result

cluster_max_service_num.description: Max service number in the cluster

err_msg.description: Error message if an error occurs

recommended_clusterip_cidrs_ipv6.description: Recommend Cluster IP CIDR List IPv6

cluster_max_node_num.description: Max node number in a cluster

err_msg.description: Error message if an error occures

max_pods_per_node.description: Max pod number in a node

total_count.description: The total count of the result

output_file.description: CDS volume search result output file

cert_name.description: Name of the Cert to be queried

function_name.description: CFC function name, length must be between 1 and 64 bytes

log_bos_dir.description: Log save dir if log type is bos

memory_size.description: CFC Function memory size, should be an integer multiple of 128

dts_name.description: Name of the Dts to be queried

type.description: type of the task. Available values are migration, sync, subscribe.

image_type.description: Image type of the images to be queried, support ALL/System/Custom/Integration/Sharing/GpuBccSystem/GpuBccCustom/FpgaBccSystem/FpgaBccCustom

name_regex.description: Regex pattern of the search image name

dedicated_host_id.description: Dedicated host id of the instance to retrieve.

instances.description: The result of the instances list.

internal_ip.description: Internal ip address of the instance to retrieve.

output_file.description: Output file of the instances search result

zone_name.description: Name of the available zone to which the instance belongs.

ip.description: Specify the EIP binded by the NAT gateway to retrieve.

nat_id.description: ID of the NAT gateway to retrieve.

vpc_id.description: VPC ID where the NAT gateways located.

peer_conn_id.description: ID of the peer connection to retrieve.

peer_conns.description: The list of the peer connections.

vpc_id.description: VPC ID where the peer connections located.

name_regex.description: Regex pattern of the search name of rds instance

output_file.description: Output file of the instances search result

rdss.description: The result of the instances list.

route_rule_id.description: ID of the routing rule to be retrieved.

route_table_id.description: Routing table ID for the routing rules to retrieve.

vpc_id.description: VPC ID for the routing rules.

cluster_type.description: Type of the instance,  Available values are cluster, master_slave.

node_capacity.description: Memory capacity(GB) of the instance node.

specs.description: Useful spec list, when create a scs instance, suggest use node_type/cpu_num/instance_flavor/allowed_nodeNum_list as scs instance parameters

name_regex.description: Regex pattern of the search name of scs instance

output_file.description: Output file of the instances search result

scss.description: The result of the instances list.

output_file.description: Security Group search result output file
Security Group search result output file

snapshots.description: The result of the snapshots list.

volume_id.description: Volume ID to be attached of snapshots, if volume is system disk, volume ID is instance ID

cpu_count.description: Useful cpu count of the search spec

instance_type.description: Instance type of the search spec

memory_size_in_gb.description: Useful memory size in GB of the search spec

name_regex.description: Regex pattern of the search spec name

specs.description: Useful spec list, when create a bcc instance, suggest use instance_type/cpu_count/memory_capacity_in_gb as bcc instance parameters

subnet_type.description: Specify the subnet type for subnets.

vpc_id.description: VPC ID for subnets to retrieve.

zone_name.description: Specify the zone name for subnets.
